Pulses.name: Red Kidney Beans
Pulses.description: Nutritious and protein-rich red kidney beans, perfect for curries or salads.

Pulses.name: Wheat (Dal)
Pulses.description: Whole wheat dal, great for making traditional Indian dishes like chapati and dal.

Pulses.name: Yellow Split Peas (Toor Dal)
Pulses.description: Nutritious yellow split peas, also known as toor dal, a staple in Indian cuisine.
